BrainSAIT Tailscale Control

Secure GitOps for Tailscale ACLs

⚙️ ACL Usage Guide

Edit your ACLs in tailscale/acls.json, using the following structure:

```json { “tagOwners”: { “tag:macbook”: [“user:fadil369@github”] }, “acls”: [ { “action”: “accept”, “src”: [“tag:macbook”], “dst”: [“tag:win10:*”] } ] }
